row.process:
:SET &FOUND# = 0 :SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP", "JSON_DISCOVERY_RESULT:*") :PROCESS &HND# : SET &LINE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#) : SET &JSON# = STR_SUB (&LINE#, "JSON_DISCOVERY_RESULT:", "") : SET &TOP_RUNID# = SYS_ACT_TOP_NR() : SET &TOP_RUNID# = FORMAT(&TOP_RUNID#) : SET &LENGTH# = STR_LENGTH(&JSON#) : SET &LENGTH# = FORMAT(&LENGTH#) : SET &VARA_TARGET_NAME# = PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.DISCOVERY.RESULT.VARA.TEMP.&TOP_RUNID# : PRINT "Writing discovery result to &VARA_TARGET_NAME#" : PRINT "KEY (Run Id of the top workflow) is &TOP_RUNID#" : PRINT "VALUE (JSON result) is &LENGTH# characters long" : SET &variableName# = &VARA_TARGET_NAME# : SET &variablePath# = "" : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CREATE_PASS_VALUES_VARIABLE : PUT_VAR &variableName#, &TOP_RUNID#, &JSON# : PRINT "Finish writing." : SET &FOUND# = 1 :ENDPROCESS
:IF &FOUND# = 0 : PRINT "Cannot find JSON Discovery Result in the Job report." : EXIT 100 :ENDIF
